fields.Title: OFFICE / SECRETARYS RADIO
fields.Description: You can remove the transceiver from this radio as part of the MORALIST DREAM QUEST

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But now you've got what you came f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But now you've got what you came for, so I suppose we'll have to see this business through."

fields.Title: You: ""I prefer a transceiver with a litt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I prefer a transceiver with a little more *flash and style*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let me make a prediction, detectiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me make a prediction, detective. You are not going to see the inside of a Coalition warship anytime soon."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "If this transceiver were a person,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If this transceiver were a person, it would be an accountant at a large logistics firm. Perfectly competent, but unexceptional.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm. I don't think the people who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm. I don't think the people who typically buy these machines are very concerned with questions of *style*."

fields.Title: You: ""We can't assign *la responsabilité..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can't assign *la responsabilité* if we don't go through the proper channels."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Show me what, detective?" The lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Show me what, detective?" The lieutenant seems immensely pleased by your irritation.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose it does have a certain '..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suppose it does have a certain 'no-nonsense' appeal, if you prefer that sort of thing."

fields.Title: You: "Flip the release switch."
fields.Dialogue Text: Flip the release switch.

fields.Title: You: "Examine the transceiver."
fields.Dialogue Text: Examine the transceiver.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It doesn't, frankly. Don't get me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't, frankly. Don't get me wrong, this appears to be a *fine* transceiver for a general audience, but it's not something a serious radio-head would use." He shrugs.

fields.Title: You: ""There's something *ominous* about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's something *ominous* about this radio transceiver. It's an ill omen."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To be perfectly frank, I have my r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To be perfectly frank, I have my reservations about this whole antenna scheme. But who knows? We may yet be surprised."

fields.Title: You: ""Reliable and unassuming. My kind o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Reliable and unassuming. My kind of transceiver."

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The transceiver appears slightly be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The transceiver appears slightly bewildered by your comment.

fields.Title: Office Radio: "A common office radio, like any of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A common office radio, like any of those found in countless waiting rooms, lounges, and other semi-public spaces all over the world.

fields.Title: You: "How do I get the transceiver out of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How do I get the transceiver out of this thing?
fields.Alternate1: "Kim, how do I get the transceiver out of this thing?"

fields.Title: You: "Good point, no need to be greedy."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good point, no need to be greedy.

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The lock disengages with a nice cli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lock disengages with a nice click. You may now safely remove the transceiver unit.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course not, detective. This is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not, detective. This is *strictly* business." The lieutenant smiles to himself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, 'reliable and unassuming' are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, 'reliable and unassuming' are *definitely* words I'd use to describe you."

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The radio appreciates your restrain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The radio appreciates your restraint. It buzzes contentedly.

fields.Title: You: ""Well, I guess this will just have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, I guess this will just have to do, then."

fields.Title: You: ""Sorry for stealing you, transceive..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry for stealing you, transceiver, but there was no other way."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure the transceiver understan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure the transceiver understands, detective. Now let's go."

fields.Title: You: "But what if I want *another* one, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But what if I want *another* one, as a backup?

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The radio appears to disapprove of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The radio appears to disapprove of your acquisitiveness. Its buzz seems to drive you away.

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The transceiver appears to take thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The transceiver appears to take this as a compliment.
fields.Alternate1: Regardless, the transceiver appears to take your words as a compliment.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's usually a little switch so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's usually a little switch somewhere... Ah, yes, it's the one that says 'RELEASE'." The lieutenant points to the side of the radio.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't like to guess. Your per..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wouldn't like to guess. Your performance so far doesn't exactly inspire confidence, but all sorts of things are possible..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very good. Let's get going then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very good. Let's get going then."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I certainly understand the impulse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I certainly understand the impulse, but this is our job, detective. Our whole *raison d'être*. At some point, we'll need to return to it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a brief no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant gives you a brief nod.

fields.Title: You: ""How does this compare to your Dyna..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How does this compare to your DynaWave, Kim?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and  Variable["ice.kim_challenge_accepted"] == true  and  Variable["XP.made_kim_transceiver_jealous"] == false  and  Variable["gates.office_radio_examined_transceiver"] == true

fields.Title: You: "(Tap it with your knuckles.) "Yeah,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Tap it with your knuckles.) "Yeah, this'll do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've surprised me more than once..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've surprised me more than once during the course of our investigation, but I have to say it still seems like a *remote* scenario." He shrugs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But here's the thing, detective. *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But here's the thing, detective. *We're* the proper channels. Doing our work, right here on the ground, is how we'll solve this case. There's no need to bring the Coalition into this."

fields.Title: Office Radio: "You have no need for this transceiv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have no need for this transceiver, because you already have one just like it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who's to say what's possible and w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who's to say what's possible and what's not?"

fields.Title: You: "(Clench your fist.) "I'll show you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Clench your fist.) "I'll show you yet, Kitsuragi."

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The transceiver appears quite at pe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The transceiver appears quite at peace with its appearance.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm more interested in *why* you'r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm more interested in *why* you're so fixated on this idea in the first place."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You sound pathological, you know t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You sound pathological, you know that? Now come on, let's stop wasting time."

fields.Title: You: ""But Kim, I need to collect *all* t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But Kim, I need to collect *all* the radio transceivers. For thoroughness' sake."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The transceiver appears to understa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The transceiver appears to understand and forgive you.
fields.Alternate1: It's true. The transceiver appears quite forgiving.

fields.Title: You: ""I think I just need a break from o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I just need a break from our main case for a bit."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do you need with another tran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you need with another transceiver? It's almost exactly like the one you took from that radiocomputer in the Doomed Commercial Area."

fields.Title: Office Radio: "It's quite easy. Simply flip the sw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's quite easy. Simply flip the switch labeled 'RELEASE' to disengage the lock that holds the transceiver unit in place.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*You* could reach the Coalition an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You* could reach the Coalition and have your talk about *la responsabilité*... *I* could grow 10 centimetres and become a flanker for the Stormers."

fields.Title: You: ""That's fine. I'm not interested in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's fine. I'm not interested in 'pissing competitions,' as you know."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose it will." The lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suppose it will." The lieutenant smiles to himself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure where you're getting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure where you're getting that. It's a perfectly fine transceiver and this is a perfectly ordinary office."

fields.Title: You: ""Good point, no need to be greedy.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good point, no need to be greedy."

fields.Title: You: ""I guess pure functionality is itse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess pure functionality is itself a kind of aesthetics."

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The transceiver appears glad to be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The transceiver appears glad to be of service.

fields.Title: Office Radio: "With its transceiver gone, the radi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With its transceiver gone, the radio has ceased its peristent buzzing. It is as silent as a headstone.

fields.Title: You: ""To be honest, I mostly just want t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To be honest, I mostly just want to ride on Coalition Warship Archer."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Do you think we'll actually be abl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think we'll actually be able to reach the Coalition with this?"

fields.Title: Office Radio: "There's nothing obviously remarkabl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's nothing obviously remarkable about it. It's about the size of a common pasta box, with knobs of molded plastic. What else is there to say?

fields.Title: Office Radio: "The transceiver appears slightly hu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The transceiver appears slightly hurt by your comment.
